# Translating.

Thank you for being interested in making Call of Cthulhu 7th Edition for Foundry VTT better! Below is a list of translations keys on existing files that still need translated, based on `en.json`. Feel free to create a new `*.json` file for a language that is not shown here!

The following translations have more than 75 untranslated strings [are you able to help?](./ABANDONED.md)

[cn.json (102 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#cnjson)

[cs.json (143 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#csjson)

[de.json (101 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#dejson)

[es.json (102 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#esjson)

[it.json (181 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#itjson)

[ja.json (103 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#jajson)

[ko.json (391 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#kojson)

[pl.json (102 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#pljson)

[pt-BR.json (339 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#pt-brjson)

[ru.json (261 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#rujson)

[uk.json (144 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#ukjson)

[zh-TW.json (113 untranslated strings)](./ABANDONED.md#zh-twjson)
